C

canRedo() - Method in class chess.model.ChessGame
This game can be redone if and only if: the game is not in inspection mode (paused or read-only); the current state is inconclusive; the player to move is not an agent; the game has record of future transformations.
canReset() - Method in class chess.model.ChessGame
This game can be reset if and only if it has been transformed, i.e.
canUndo() - Method in class chess.model.ChessGame
This game can be undone if and only if: the game is not in inspection mode (paused or read-only); the player to move is not an agent or the current state is conclusive; the game has previous record of transformations. In the case of the game state being conclusive, allowing undo enables the final player (whether an agent or human) to retract the last move and go for an alternative move.
Capture - Class in chess.model.moves
A concrete object that represents a capture.
Capture(Piece, Piece) - Constructor for class chess.model.moves.Capture
Constructs a capture for a subject piece and the piece to be captured.
capturePiece(Piece) - Method in class chess.model.Chessboard

Castling - Class in chess.model.moves
A subcategory of the regular move that represents a Castling, with a King being the subject piece of the main movement and a target Rook making a subsequent regular move.
Castling(King, Position, Rook, Position) - Constructor for class chess.model.moves.Castling
Constructs a Castling for a subject King and a target Rook.
checkmated - Enum constant in enum class chess.model.ChessGame.States
A conclusive case in which a player is checkmated the other.

Color - Enum Class in chess.model
A binary color enumeration: White or Black.
Colored - Class in chess.model
An abstract entity that is to be inherited by any object that plays a color-dependent role in a Chess game, including but may not be limited to all concrete subtypes of Player, Piece, and Movable.
